creator: madunphy@bigfoot.com
text:
In Ant1.3, the Antstructure task produced a invalid DTD file with the entry 
element. This specific problem was fixed in a subsequent nightly build. I 
downloaded the 1.4 alpha build from 11-march-2001. After running the 
antstructure to create a DTD, I have noticed that the report (nested 
junitreport) element is undefined.

Also, the weblogic tasks wlrun and wlstop are now also missing. This is not an 
exhaustive list of "missing" definitions, just the ones I've come across.

creator: conor@apache.org
text:
The nightly build does not build all optional tasks because not all of the 
required third party libraries are available on the nightly build machine. This 
will not be changed. You should be able to use the optional jar from 1.3 with 
the 1.4alpha build. 

I'll also try and post (infrequently) an optional.jar with most of the optional 
tasks included.
